title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 37 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 37 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: At this also my heart trembleth, and is moved out of his place.
lineList.cn: 因此我心战兢，从原处移动。

lineList.en: Hear attentively the noise of his voice, and the sound that goeth out of his mouth.
lineList.cn: 听阿，神轰轰的声音，是他口中所发的响声。

lineList.en: He directeth it under the whole heaven, and his lightning unto the ends of the earth.
lineList.cn: 他发响声震遍天下，发电光闪到地极。

lineList.en: After it a voice roareth: he thundereth with the voice of his excellency; and he will not stay them when his voice is heard.
lineList.cn: 随后人听见有雷声轰轰，大发威严，雷电接连不断。

lineList.en: God thundereth marvellously with his voice; great things doeth he, which we cannot comprehend.
lineList.cn: 神发出奇妙的雷声，他行大事，我们不能测透。

lineList.en: For he saith to the snow, Be thou on the earth; likewise to the small rain, and to the great rain of his strength.
lineList.cn: 他对雪说，要降在地上，对大雨和暴雨也是这样说。

lineList.en: He sealeth up the hand of every man; that all men may know his work.
lineList.cn: 他封住各人的手，叫所造的万人，都晓得他的作为。

lineList.en: Then the beasts go into dens, and remain in their places.
lineList.cn: 百兽进入穴中，卧在洞内。

lineList.en: Out of the south cometh the whirlwind: and cold out of the north.
lineList.cn: 暴风出于南宫。寒冷出于北方。

lineList.en: By the breath of God frost is given: and the breadth of the waters is straitened.
lineList.cn: 神嘘气成冰。宽阔之水也都凝结。

lineList.en: Also by watering he wearieth the thick cloud: he scattereth his bright cloud:
lineList.cn: 他使密云盛满水气，布散电光之云。

lineList.en: And it is turned round about by his counsels: that they may do whatsoever he commandeth them upon the face of the world in the earth.
lineList.cn: 这云是藉他的指引游行旋转，得以在全地面上，行他一切所吩咐的，

lineList.en: He causeth it to come, whether for correction, or for his land, or for mercy.
lineList.cn: 或为责罚，或为润地，或为施行慈爱。

lineList.en: Hearken unto this, O Job: stand still, and consider the wondrous works of God.
lineList.cn: 约伯阿，你要留心听，要站立思想神奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: Dost thou know when God disposed them, and caused the light of his cloud to shine?
lineList.cn: 神如何吩咐这些，如何使云中的电光照耀，你知道吗。

lineList.en: Dost thou know the balancings of the clouds, the wondrous works of him which is perfect in knowledge?
lineList.cn: 云彩如何浮于空中，那知识全备者奇妙的作为，你知道吗。

lineList.en: How thy garments are warm, when he quieteth the earth by the south wind?
lineList.cn: 南风使地寂静，你的衣服就如火热，你知道吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou with him spread out the sky, which is strong, and as a molten looking glass?
lineList.cn: 你岂能与神同铺穹苍吗。这穹苍坚硬，如同铸成的镜子。

lineList.en: Teach us what we shall say unto him; for we cannot order our speech by reason of darkness.
lineList.cn: 我们愚昧不能陈说。请你指教我们该对他说什么话。

lineList.en: Shall it be told him that I speak? if a man speak, surely he shall be swallowed up.
lineList.cn: 人岂可说，我愿与他说话。岂有人自愿灭亡吗。

lineList.en: And now men see not the bright light which is in the clouds: but the wind passeth, and cleanseth them.
lineList.cn: 现在有云遮蔽，人不得见穹苍的光亮。但风吹过，天又发晴。

lineList.en: Fair weather cometh out of the north: with God is terrible majesty.
lineList.cn: 金光出于北方，在神那里有可怕的威严。

lineList.en: Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out: he is excellent in power, and in judgment, and in plenty of justice: he will not afflict.
lineList.cn: 论到全能者，我们不能测度。他大有能力，有公平和大义，必不苦待人。

lineList.en: Men do therefore fear him: he respecteth not any that are wise of heart.
lineList.cn: 所以，人敬畏他。凡自以为心中有智慧的人，他都不顾念。
